description: Attributed to Dougal Graham.| Both the illustration (two drunks holding each other up) and the typeface and layout on the title page differ from the items at [Ao].8/3.1(18), 5.1009(16[14]), Mas.619(22), YY.8/2.1(32), L.C.2894(22), L.C.2852.A(23) and Hall.224.h.4(7). The text is identical. StEdNL.| Dated from external evidence.
